posts.post_title: FS: 1910-12 Sweet Caporal P2 Hauser Pin
posts.post_content:
Selling this nice 1910-12 Sweet Caporal P2 Arnold Hauser pin. Very clean front and back including paper. Asking $75 Shipped. Accept PayPal FF or GS add 3%. Thank You!


Not sure why pics came out so blurry here, very clear on my end if anyone needs better pics can email or text to you!
Price Drop $65 shipped, very nice pin!
